document_data.name: Allinzir Gi'Leera
document_data.mainbody: '''Allinzir Gi'leera''' was a [[proxy]] of [[Vhaeraun]], the [[Dark Seldarine]] [[deity]] of thievery and treachery. He was also the sole individual among Vhaeraun's proxies — who for their own safety tried to avoid attention and keep their identities secret — that was publicly known.
document_data.Description: Like all of Vhaeraun's proxies, Allinzir was a male [[drow]].
document_data.Personality: Allinzir was an incredibly subtle and constantly scheming individual. He carried himself with an air of smooth pleasantness and a cold smile that almost never faltered. He always looked for indirect or roundabout solutions to any problem he faced, even if a straightforward one was available.
document_data.Abilities:
Allinzir possessed the same abilities that were given to all of Vhaeraun's proxies. This included ''[[trusight]]'', a catlike grace, abilities related to thievery, and abilities related to striking at creatures that could only be harmed by magical weapons.

Unlike other drow, Allinzir was uniquely unaffected by sunlight. And he could disappear into the shadows, even while being watched, then reappear elsewhere.
document_data.Activities: Allinzir operated in the shadows, working against the machinations of the Dark Seldarine goddess [[Lolth]], just like all proxies of Vhaeraun. Beyond this duty as Vhaeraun's proxy, Allinzir operated as a member of the planar faction known as the [[Revolutionary League]].
